General purpose functions

Dataframe_to_latex(dataframe, sep=',')

A function to convert a pandas dataframe to a latex table. When running this function the output will be printed.

Parameters

  • seperator – The dataframe that needs to be converted

  • seperator – The seperator the type used can be “.” or “,”.

Find_nearest(array, value)

A function to convert a pandas dataframe to a latex table. When running this function the output will be printed.

Parameters

  • array – The array in which to search for a given value

  • value – The value to search for

Returns

A tuple containing the value closest to the value and the index on where to find it.

Return type

Tuple
